snippet.title: BleedingBorderSteamTrailer02
snippet.description:
Bleeding Border is a first person 3d survival horror game in which the player must escape through the top of a monster infested building using his own blood as the only defense mechanism.

http://store.steampowered.com/app/416...

Fixed Steam Trailer of BleedingBorder.
The last trailer didn't fit the quality intended for our viewer.
